name: mDNS Spoofer
author: Joe Testa <jtesta@positronsecurity.com>
James Lee <egypt@metasploit.com>
Robin Francois <rof@navixia.com>
description: This module will listen for mDNS multicast requests on 5353/udp for A and AAAA record queries, and respond with a spoofed IP address (assuming the request matches our regex).

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: TIMEOUT
options.description: The number of seconds to wait for new data

options.name: GATEWAY_PROBE_HOST
options.description: Send a TTL=1 random UDP datagram to this host to discover the default gateway's MAC

options.name: GATEWAY_PROBE_PORT
options.description: The port on GATEWAY_PROBE_HOST to send a random UDP probe to (random if 0 or unset)

options.name: SPOOFIP4
options.description: IPv4 address with which to spoof A-record queries

options.name: SPOOFIP6
options.description: IPv6 address with which to spoof AAAA-record queries

options.name: REGEX
options.description: Regex applied to the mDNS to determine if spoofed reply is sent

options.name: TTL
options.description: Time To Live for the spoofed response (in seconds)
